General.Name: Bird Global
General.Description: Bird Global, Inc., a micromobility company, engages in delivering electric transportation solutions for short distances in Canada, the United States, the European Union, the United Kingdom, the Middle East, South America, China, Mexico, Australia, New Zealand, and Japan. The company offers a fleet of e-scooters and e-bikes to riders through bird.co website. It sells vehicles to distributors, retailers, and direct customers. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Miami, Florida.
General.Address: 392 NE 191st Street, Miami, FL, United States, 33179
